markdown:
Skip to main content

###### Menu

____ Show/hide collapsed content

Here you will find valuable resources to help your students explore trades and connect with our Youth Programs.

##  Resources for Educators

**Looking for Activity Plans specific to the Youth Explore Trade Skills Program? Visit**[**Explore Trades Skills Activity Plans**](/youth-explore-trade-skills-activity-plans)**for downloadable resources.**

  * [School Year 2025/2026 Youth Programs Timeline](/media/2456/download)

  * [Trade Guide Edition 3](/media/1521/download) The Trades Guide can be used to help students and is an inspiring and practical resource full of useful tips and information that you can share with them. In addition, the Trades Guide Learning Supplement provides activities to get students talking about trades.

  * [2016 Learning Supplement](/media/1517/download)

  * [Presentation Deck](/media/1520/download)

  * [2016 Worksheets](/media/1519/download)

  * [Skilled Trades Workshop Guide](/media/2668/download)




[What is a Trade? Handout](/media/1169/download)

  * A 2-sided colour handout that defines a trade, explains the trade apprenticeship, and a full trades listing.




[Youth Programs Handout](/media/1173/download)

  * A 2-sided colour handout that explores SkilledTradesBC's Youth Program Streams and answers the question “Why Choose Trades?”




[Youth Employer Sponsor Handout](/media/2370/download)

  * A 2-sided colour handout that answers the question “Why become an Employer Sponsor?” Send this to a company that might be a good fit for your students
